message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value it brings to you. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, considering my budget and the value I expect to get from the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low. I'm willing to come down to $1,000,000, which still allows me to make a profit. This is a fair compromise, considering the value you'll get from this product.  Let me know if you're interested in this price.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value I'll get from it and the market value of similar products.
